CLAUSE 38: S
============================================================
Type: rent
Risk Level: standard
Word Count: 36
------------------------------------------------------------

EVERABILITY. If a court of competent jurisdiction shall, at any time, hold that a portion of this
Rental Agreement is invalid, the remainder shall not be affected thereby and shall continue in full force
and effect.
